messages.subject: new recordings, and new things on my site
messages.msgSnippet: http://aboutunschooling.blogspot.com/2013/04/confidence-learning-new-recordings.html That link leads to two pages with nice additional writing from yesterday
messages.messageBody:
http://aboutunschooling.blogspot.com/2013/04/confidence-learning-new-recordings.html

That link leads to two pages with nice additional writing from yesterday (not mine; look there to see whose), and Pam Sorooshian let me know just this morning that two (of the four) talks I gave at the HSC conference in Sacramento are available to download for $7.

The link above has links to my notes on those talks.
I haven't heard them yet myself, so I hope they're good ones and not the kind of embarrassing ones where I want to make a list of notes about what I said and what I wish I had said instead. :-)

Sandra
